projects.name: TransmogrifAI
projects.description: AutoML library for building modular, reusable, strongly typed machine learning workflows on Apache Spark with minimal hand tuning.

projects.name: oclif
projects.description: A framework for building CLIs in Node.js. Designed both for simple CLIs that can be just a single file with a few flag options, or for very complex CLIs that have many subcommands.

projects.name: Akita
projects.description: State management tailored-made for Javascript applications from the team at Datorama.

projects.name: JA3
projects.description: Create SSL/TLS client fingerprints that should be easy to produce on any platform and can be easily shared for threat intelligence.

projects.name: Lightning Design System for React
projects.description: An implementation of the Salesforce Lightning Design System with accessible patterns and established best practices.

projects.name: Apache Phoenix
projects.description: Apache Phoenix enables OLTP and operational analytics in Hadoop for low latency applications.

projects.name: CNCF Buildpacks
projects.description: Buildpacks are pluggable, modular tools that translate source code into OCI images.

projects.name: decaNLP
projects.description: The Natural Language Decathlon is a benchmark for studying general NLP models that can perform a variety of complex, natural language tasks.
